oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: WHN Guest Disc Jockey - Bill Anderson - 1980-03-22
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: The recording is from Bill Anderson's (musician) performance as disc jockey for WHN Studios. The performance was on March 22, 1980. The tape was created by the WHN radio network.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Bill Anderson
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: (00:00) It's Like We Never Said Goodbye (Crystal Gayle) -- (01:00) Bill Anderson greet the audience -- (01:10) Peanuts and Diamonds (Bill Anderson) -- (04:07) Anderson reflects on the benefits of being a disc jockey -- (04:36) Don't Fall in Love With a Dreamer (Kenny Rogers) -- (08:08) Anderson praises Kenny Rogers' attitude -- (08:43) Sometimes (Bill Anderson and Mary Lou Turner) -- (11:25) Anderson performs a weather radio spot -- (12:10) Eli Wallach and Anderson perform an Immigrants Savings Bank commercial spot -- (13:15) TWA commercial spot hosted by an unidentified host -- (13:55) When Two Worlds Collide (Bill Anderson and Roger Miller) -- (16:07) Anderson reflects on writing "When Two Worlds Collide" with Roger Miller -- (18:11) Make Mine Night Time (Bill Anderson) -- (21:06) Anderson shows his appreciation for his crew; additionally, Anderson provides an introduction to the Kendalls' show -- (21:38) Frank Perdue and Anderson perform a Perdue Farms commercial spot -- (22:41) Chevy jingle [featuring unidentified host voiceover] ([Unidentified]) -- (23:10) An unidentified duo perform a Lafayette Radio Store commercial spot -- (23:41) I'd Love to Lay You Down (Conway Twitty) -- (26:48) Anderson addresses his upcoming live show -- (27:11) Head to Toe (Bobby Braddock) -- (29:29) Anderson reflects on the poor weather and Gayle Davis-- (30:23) Motor Craft commercial spot hosted by an unidentified host -- (30:55) General Electric Climate Doctors commercial spot hosted by an unidentified host -- (32:57) Longer (Dan Fogelberg) -- (36:09) Anderson introduces Mel Tillis' show -- (36:27) Liars One, Believers Zero (Bill Anderson) -- (38:53) Anderson performs a gambling radio spot -- (39:37) A.M.C.O. Transmissions commercial spot hosted by an unidentified host -- (40:05) Ford Motor Company commercial spot hosted by an unidentified host -- (41:05) Mobile One commercial spot hosted by an unidentified host -- (42:07) Shriner's Convention (Ray Stevens) -- (46:17) I Can't Wait Any Longer (Bill Anderson) -- (50:16) Anderson recalls a story about a limo driver -- (50:52) True Value Hardware Store commercial spot hosted by Pat Summerall -- (51:23) Campho-Phenique commercial spot hosted by an unidentified host -- (51:53) Motor Craft commercial spot hosted by an unidentified host -- (52:25) A Lesson in Leavin' (Dottie West) -- (55:19) Tab Cola commercial spot hosted by an unidentified host -- (56:20) Time Square Stores commercial spot hosted by an unidentified host -- (57:23) Anderson says his goodbyes and performs last second radio plugs -- (58:27) Still (Bill Anderson) -- (1:01:08) An unidentified voice announces the time -- (1:01:14) Him [excerpt] [featuring Jerry Carol voiceover] (Rupert Holmes)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Anderson, Bill; Anderson, Bill, 1937-;
